CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends       libldap2-dev       libsasl2-dev &&     apt-get clean &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&     curl -L https://github.com/jwilder/dockerize/releases/download/v0.6.0/dockerize-linux-amd64-v0.6.0.tar.gz          --output /tmp/dockerize-linux-amd64-v0.6.0.tar.gz &&     tar -C /usr/local/bin -zxvf /tmp/dockerize-linux-amd64-v0.6.0.tar.gz &&     rm -f /tmp/dockerize-linux-amd64-v0.6.0.tar.gz &&     docker-php-ext-configure ldap --with-libdir=lib/x86_64-linux-gnu --with-ldap-sasl &&     docker-php-ext-install ldap
Commands.Name: run
